summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED THE VEHICLE'S DRIVER SIDE DOOR PINS SHATTERED CAUSING THE DOOR TO MALFUNCTION WHEN ATTEMPTING TO OPEN IT FROM THE INSIDE.  ALSO, THE WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR MALFUNCTIONED AS WELL.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, WHO DETERMINED THAT THE REPAIRS SHOULD BE COVERED UNDER A RECALL.  THE DEALER NEEDED DOCUMENTATION THAT WOULD SUPPORT THE RECALL WORK.  NO REPAIRS HAD BEEN MADE.
